mapper.select: SELECT e.emp_id, e.emp_name, (d.emp_dept_name) AS dept, (select c.common_code_name FROM commons_code c WHERE c.common_code_idx = e.emp_grade_idx ) AS grade, (select c.common_code_name FROM commons_code c WHERE c.common_code_idx = e.emp_position_idx ) AS position FROM employee e JOIN department d WHERE e.emp_dept_idx = d.emp_dept_idx AND e.emp_id NOT IN ("master") ORDER BY e.emp_dept_idx ASC, e.emp_position_idx ASC, e.emp_grade_idx ASC

SELECT e.emp_id, e.emp_name, (d.emp_dept_name) AS dept, (select c.common_code_name FROM commons_code c WHERE c.common_code_idx = e.emp_grade_idx ) AS grade, (select c.common_code_name FROM commons_code c WHERE c.common_code_idx = e.emp_position_idx ) AS position FROM employee e JOIN department d WHERE e.emp_dept_idx = d.emp_dept_idx AND e.emp_id NOT IN ("master", #{param1}) ORDER BY e.emp_dept_idx ASC, e.emp_position_idx ASC, e.emp_grade_idx ASC

SELECT e.emp_id, e.emp_name, d.emp_dept_name AS dept, (SELECT c.common_code_name FROM commons_code c WHERE c.common_code_idx = e.emp_grade_idx) AS grade, (SELECT c.common_code_name FROM commons_code c WHERE c.common_code_idx = e.emp_position_idx) AS position FROM employee e JOIN department d ON e.emp_dept_idx = d.emp_dept_idx WHERE e.emp_id NOT IN ( 'master', #{param1}, (SELECT emp_id FROM employee WHERE emp_dept_idx = 6 AND emp_position_idx = 8) ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM creator_perm WHERE cre_idx = #{param2} AND e.emp_id = emp_id ) ORDER BY e.emp_dept_idx ASC, e.emp_position_idx ASC, e.emp_grade_idx ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT (d.emp_dept_name) AS dept FROM employee e JOIN department d WHERE e.emp_dept_idx = d.emp_dept_idx AND e.emp_id NOT IN ("master") ORDER BY e.emp_dept_idx ASC
